citation: HCAI Patient Discharge Data; HCAI Emergency Department Data
description: This dataset contains counts of inpatient hospitalizations and emergency department visits for persons experiencing homelessness.
keywords: department of health care access and information
name: hospital-encounters-for-homeless-patients

resources.description: This dataset contains counts of inpatient hospitalizations and emergency department visits for persons experiencing homelessness and non-homeless patients Note: Unknown age and Unknown sex are not included. Other Payer includes Workers’ Compensation, Other Government, Title V, Disability, VA Plan, Other Payer, invalid, and missing.
resources.name: 2021-2022-homeless-hospital-encounters-by-facility
resources.title: 2021-2022 Homeless Hospital Encounters by Facility

resources.description: Data dictionary for "2021-2022 Homeless Hospital Encounters by Facility" data set.
resources.name: data-dictionary-homeless-hospital-encounters-by-facility

sources.title: Data Dictionary - Homeless Hospital Encounters by Facility

resources.title: Data Dictionary - Homeless Hospital Encounters by Facility

resources.description: This dataset contains Statewide counts of inpatient hospitalizations and emergency department visits for patients experiencing homelessness and all patients; stratified by age group, race/ethnicity, sex, and expected payer. Note: Unknown age and Unknown sex are not included. Other Payer includes Workers’ Compensation, Other Government, Title V, Disability, VA Plan, Other Payer, invalid, and missing.

resources.title: 2021-2022 Homeless Hospital Encounters Statewide

resources.description: Data dictionary for "2021-2022 Homeless Hospital Encounters Statewide" data set.
resources.name: data-dictionary-homeless-hospital-encounters-statewide

sources.title: Data Dictionary - Homeless Hospital Encounters Statewide

resources.title: Data Dictionary - Homeless Hospital Encounters Statewide

resources.description: This dataset contains counts of inpatient hospitalizations and emergency department visits for persons experiencing homelessness and non-homeless patients; stratified by age group, race/ethnicity, sex, and expected payer. Note: Unknown age and Unknown sex are not included. Other Payer includes Workers’ Compensation, Other Government, Title V, Disability, VA Plan, Other Payer, invalid, and missing.
resources.name: 2019-2020-homeless-hospital-encounters-age-race-sex-expected-payer-by-facility

fields.description: Inpatient (IP) Hospitalization or Emergency Department (ED) Visit
fields.name: EncounterType
fields.title: Encounter Type

fields.description: The county where the treating hospital is located
fields.name: HospitalCounty
fields.title: Hospital County

fields.description: The 6-digit hospital identifier
fields.name: OSHPD_ID
fields.title: OSHPD ID

fields.description: The name of the treating hospital
fields.name: FacilityName
fields.title: Facility Name

fields.description: The name of common ownership and/or association for a group of facilities. For this product, only health systems which operated three or more hospitals are listed
fields.name: System
fields.title: Health System

fields.description: The hospital's ownership type (Government, Investor, or Non-Profit)
fields.name: Ownership
fields.title: Hospital Ownership Type

fields.description: Indicates if hospital has an Urban or Rural (includes Rural/Frontier) designation
fields.name: Urban_Rural
fields.title: Urban Rural Designation

fields.description: Indicates if the hospital is designated as a teaching hospital
fields.name: Teaching
fields.title: Teaching Hospital Designation

fields.description: Indicates the hospital's number of licensed beds
fields.name: LicensedBedSize
fields.title: Licensed Bed Size

fields.description: Indicates if the hospital is located in a Health Professional Shortage Area (HPSA) for Primary Care
fields.name: PrimaryCareShortageArea
fields.title: Primary Care Shortage Area

fields.description: Indicates if the hospital is located in a Health Professional Shortage Area (HPSA) for Mental Health Care
fields.name: MentalHealthShortageArea
fields.title: Mental Health Shortage Area

fields.description: Indicates if the data is for Homeless or Non-Homeless encounters
fields.name: HomelessIndicator
fields.title: Homeless Indicator

fields.description: Age, Race, Sex, or (Expected) Payer Note: Unknown age and Unknown sex are not included. Other Payer includes Workers’ Compensation, Other Government, Title V, Disability, VA Plan, Other Payer, invalid, and missing
fields.name: Demographic
fields.title: Demographic Category

fields.description: Value for demographic category
fields.name: DemographicValue
fields.title: Demographic Category Value

fields.description: Count of inpatient hospitalizations (i.e., discharges) or emergency department visits
fields.name: Encounters
fields.title: Encounters

fields.description: Total inpatient hospitalizations or emergency department visits per hospital. Note: the total hospital encounters may be slightly less for age and sex (versus race and expected payer) due to the exclusion of "Unknown" from age and sex
fields.name: TotalEncounters
fields.title: Total Hospital Encounters

fields.description: Calculation: Encounters/Total Hospital Encounters x 100
fields.name: Percent
fields.title: Percent
